com.digitalpersona.uareu

Interface Quality


  • public interface Quality
    Quality interface.

    Quality provides image quality calculation algorithms. Currently available: - NIST WSQ algorithm; - Aware WSQ, if licensed instance of Aware WSQ 1000 SDK is available.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Quality.QualityAlgorithm
      Constants describing algorithm to use.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int NfiqFid(Fid fid, int view_index, Quality.QualityAlgorithm quality_alg)
      Calculates NFIQ value of the FID.
      int NfiqRaw(byte[] data, int width, int height, int dpi, int bpp, Quality.QualityAlgorithm quality_alg)
      Calculates NFIQ value of the raw image.

    • Method Detail

      • NfiqFid

        int NfiqFid(Fid fid,
          int view_index,
          Quality.QualityAlgorithm quality_alg)
            throws UareUException
        Calculates NFIQ value of the FID.

        This function attempts to calculate NFIQ using Aware WSQ library (WSQ1000) or NIST algorithm.

        Parameters:
        fid - FID to analyze.
        view_index - The view for which to calculate NFIQ.
        quality_alg - Calculation algorithm to use.
        Returns:
        NFIQ value.
        Throws:
        UareUException - if failed to calculate NFIQ.

      • NfiqRaw

        int NfiqRaw(byte[] data,
          int width,
          int height,
          int dpi,
          int bpp,
          Quality.QualityAlgorithm quality_alg)
            throws UareUException
        Calculates NFIQ value of the raw image.

        This function attempts to calculate NFIQ using Aware WSQ library (WSQ1000) or NIST algorithm.

        Parameters:
        data - Image to compress.
        width - Width of the image.
        height - Heght of the image.
        dpi - Resolution of the image in DPI.
        bpp - Pixel depth of the image.
        quality_alg - Calculation algorithm to use.
        Returns:
        NFIQ value.
        Throws:
        UareUException - if failed to calculate NFIQ.
